「○〆温存」「○〆強気」「○〆全力」があり、それぞれが異なる効果を持つ: There are '○〆Preserve', '○〆Confidence', and '○〆Full Power', each with different effects
スキルカードの使用に必要なコストが増加\n強化状態・○〆体力消費コストには影響し:

レッスン・自主レッスン・オーディションによるパラメータ上昇を増加させる: Increases parameter gains from lessons, self-practice, and auditions.
メモリーを再生成できる回数が2回に増加します: The number of times memory can be regenerated is increased to 2 times
パラメータ上昇値を増加\nパラメータ上昇効果を持たないスキルカードには影響しない:
Increases parameter boost values

パラメータ上昇回数を増加\nパラメータ上昇効果を持たないスキルカードには影響しな:
Increases the number of parameter boosts 
Does not affect Skill Cards without parameter boost effects
プロデュースの方向性を示すもので、プロデュースアイドルごとに決められています。登: This indicates the direction of production, which is determined for each production idol. The types of skill cards and P items that appear vary by plan.

条件を満たすごとに、レッスン終了まで、このスキルカード自身の性能が変化する: The performance of this Skill Card changes until the end of the lesson for each condition met
私たちの今後の方針について、\n重要な話があるの。: I have an important matter to discuss regarding our future direction.
<color=#8581FF>指針</color>「○〆全力」「○〆強気」「○〆: <color=#8581FF>Guideline</color> Plan to develop using "○〆Full Power," "○〆Confident," and "○〆Preserve"
○〆全力に変更時、○〆スキルカード使用数追加+1・<color=#8581FF>:
When switched to ○〆Full Power, adds +1 to ○〆Skill Card usage and moves Skill Cards from <color=#8581FF>On Hold</color> to the hand.
While in ○〆Full Power state, parameter increases by 200%.
○〆Full Power is canceled at the end of the turn.
<color=#8581FF>Guideline</color> cannot be changed until ○〆Full Power is canceled.
指針を○〆強気に変更する\nすでに○〆強気の場合、2段階目になる\r\n\n▼1:
Switch Guideline to ○〆Confident.
If already ○〆Confident, it moves to Phase 2.

▼Phase 1
Parameter increase and stamina consumption increase by 100%.

▼Phase 2
Parameter increase by 150%, stamina consumption increases by 100%.
Each Skill Card use consumes 1 ○〆Stamina.
指針を○〆温存に変更する\nすでに○〆温存の場合、2段階目になる\r\n\n▼1:
Switch Guideline to ○〆Preserve.
If already ○〆Preserve, it moves to Phase 2.

▼Phase 1
Parameter increase and stamina consumption decrease by 50%.
When canceled, ○〆Enthusiasm +5 and ○〆Skill Card usage +1.

▼Phase 2
Parameter increase and stamina consumption decrease by 75%.
When canceled, ○〆Enthusiasm +8, ○〆Energy +5, and ○〆Skill Card usage +1.
ボーカル、ダンス、ビジュアルすべてのSPレッスン発生率+5%: SP Lesson occurrence rate for Vocal, Dance, and Visual +5%.
以降の試験でライバルのスコアが増加: Increased scores for rivals in subsequent exams
パラメータ上昇量を減少（○〆好印象による上昇も含む）: Decrease the amount of parameter increase (including increase due to ○〆 good impression)

[__split__]十王 星南のプロデュースで最終試験に合格: [__split__]Pass the final test with Sena Juo's production.
○〆全力に変更時、○〆スキルカード使用数追加+1・<color=#8581FF>:
When changed to ○〆All-Out, adds +1 to the number of ○〆Skill Cards used and moves Skill Cards in <color=#8581FF>Reserve</color> to your hand.
While in ○〆All-Out state, Score Increase is boosted by 200%.
○〆All-Out is canceled at the end of the turn.
<color=#8581FF>Guidelines</color> cannot be changed until ○〆All-Out state is canceled.
指針を○〆温存に変更する\nすでに○〆温存の場合、2段階目になる\r\n\n▼1:
Change the Guideline to ○〆Conserve.
If already in ○〆Conserve, it will enter the 2nd stage.

▼Stage 1
Decreases Score Increase and Stamina Consumption by 50%.
When canceled: ○〆Enthusiasm+5, ○〆Skill Card usage count +1.

▼Stage 2
Decreases Score Increase and Stamina Consumption by 75%.
When canceled: ○〆Enthusiasm+8, ○〆Energy+5, ○〆Skill Card usage count +1.
指針を○〆強気に変更する\nすでに○〆強気の場合、2段階目になる\r\n\n▼1:
Change the Guideline to ○〆Aggressive.
If already in ○〆Aggressive, it will enter the 2nd stage.

▼Stage 1
Increases Score Increase and ○〆Stamina Consumption by 100%.

▼Stage 2
Increases Score Increase by 150% and Stamina Consumption by 100%.
Consumes 1 Stamina per Skill Card used.
[__split__]弱点を武器に\n十王 星南で最終試験に合格して評価A以上を:
[__split__]Turn weaknesses into strengths.
Pass the final test with Sena Juo with an A or higher.
[__split__]希望があるなら\n十王 星南で最終試験に合格して評価B以上:
[__split__]If there's hope,
Pass the final test with Sena Juo with a B or higher.

このターン、スキルカードを追加で使用できる: This turn, you can use an additional skill card
やる気が1増加するごとに、○〆元気の増加量を1増加: For each increase in motivation, ○〆 energy gain increases by 1
スキルカードやトラブルによる体力減少時、体力の代わりに消費される: Consumed instead of stamina when skill cards or troubles cause stamina reduction
スキルカードを獲得する。獲得したスキルカードはレッスン終了時に削除される: Obtain a skill card. The obtained skill card will be deleted at the end of the lesson
ターン終了時、好印象1ごとにパラメータを1上昇。ターン開始時、好印象が1減少: At the end of the turn, for each point of good impression, parameter increases by 1. At the start of the turn, good impression decreases by 1
プロデュースがんばりましょう！: Let's do our best in producing!
レッスン中に1回使用すると、そのレッスンが終了するまで、除外に移動する: Use once during a lesson, then it is excluded until the end of the lesson
レッスン終了までスキルカードを強化: Enhance skill cards until the end of the lesson

複数所持できず、追加入手やコピーはできない: Cannot be held in multiples, nor can it be obtained additionally or copied
